channel.title: All jobs | upwork.com
channel.description: All jobs as of May 29, 2024 10:59 UTC

item.title: Payment Aggregation and Analytics System - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced developer to create a payment aggregation and analytics system that will collect, analyze, and visualize transaction data. This system will be used for payment monitoring and reporting.

Main Tasks:

Transaction Data Aggregation:

Develop mechanisms to collect and store transaction data from various sources.
Consolidate data into a single database for further analysis.
Analytics and Reporting:

Create tools for analyzing payment data, including filtering, sorting, and aggregating information.
Develop reports and dashboards to visualize key metrics and indicators.
Integration with External Systems:

Ensure system integration with external analytics tools and APIs.
Set up automatic data transfer for further use.
Candidate Requirements:

Experience in developing analytics and data aggregation systems.
Knowledge in big data processing and report creation.
Experience working with APIs and integrating external systems.
Preferred Technologies:

Backend: Python, Node.js.
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or similar.
Analytics Tools: Tableau, Power BI, or similar.

Budget: $500
Posted On: May 29, 2024 10:37 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Realm Database, PostgreSQL, Database Design, Database Architecture, Java, NGINX, Web Development, Python, API
Skills: Realm Database, PostgreSQL, Database Design, Database Architecture, Java, NGINX, Web Development, Python, API
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Web Reports and Dashboards Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We are looking for an experienced developer to create custom reports and dashboards (we already have the procedure ) connected to our local MS SQL databases. The primary goal is to retrieve and display all reports and dashboards instantly from a web page.

**Project Details:**

1. **Databases:**
- We have two separate MS SQL databases.
- Both databases are installed locally on our servers.

2. **Requirements:**
- **Connection Setup:** Establish a secure connection to both local MS SQL databases.
- **Data Integration:** Integrate data from both databases into a centralized web-based dashboard.
- **Report Upload:** Upload and display all reports dynamically from the web app.
- **Real-Time Updates:** Ensure that the dashboards and reports are updated in real-time as data changes in the databases.
- **User Access:** Create a user-friendly interface for accessing and interacting with the dashboards and reports.

**What We Need from You:**
1. **Expertise in MS SQL:** Proven experience in working with MS SQL databases and data integration.
2. **Web Development Skills:** Ability to develop web applications that can securely connect to local databases.
3. **Reporting Tools:** Experience with reporting tools like Power BI, Tableau, or similar.
4. **Detailed Planning:** A clear plan on how you will approach the connection, integration, and real-time data updates.

**Project Steps:**
1. **Initial Consultation:** Discuss the project scope, requirements, and deliverables.
2. **Connection Setup:** Establish a secure connection to the local MS SQL databases.
3. **Development Phase:** Develop the web-based dashboard and integrate it with the databases.
4. **Testing:** Thoroughly test the connection, data integration, and real-time updates.
5. **Deployment:** Deploy the final solution and provide documentation an

Budget: $500
Posted On: May 29, 2024 08:53 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, SQL, Python, Data Analysis, JavaScript, API
Skills: Dashboard, SQL, Python, Data Analysis, JavaScript, API
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Investment Dashboard Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview: The Analyst will work closely with an individualto help them manage their personal investment portfolio effectively. This role involves creating and maintaining a comprehensive financial dashboard that tracks investments, income, expenses, savings, and other financial activities. The analyst will provide insights and recommendations based on the financial data to help clients achieve their financial goals.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Financial Dashboard Development:
o Design and develop a user-friendly personal finance dashboard.
o Integrate various financial accounts, investment portfolios, and other financial data sources into the dashboard.
o Ensure weekly data synchronization and accuracy.

2. Data Analysis and Reporting:
o Analyze financial data to identify trends, opportunities, and potential risks.
o Prepare detailed financial reports and summaries.
o Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on the analysis.

3. Investment Tracking and Management:
o Monitor investment performance and provide regular updates.
o Conduct research and analysis on potential investment opportunities.
o Assist in portfolio management and rebalancing.

4. Budgeting and Financial Planning:
o Create and maintain personal budgets.
o Develop long-term financial plans based on clients' goals and objectives.
o Provide guidance on savings, debt management, and retirement planning.

5. Client Interaction:
o Maintain regular communication with clients to update them on their financial status and any recommended actions.
o Conduct financial review meetings.
o Respond to inquiries and provide financial advice as needed.

Qualifications:
•  Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or a related field.
•  Proven experience as a financial analyst, investment analyst, or similar role.
•  Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
•  Proficiency in financial software and dashboard tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI).
•  Knowledge of investment products, financial markets, and personal finance principles.
•  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Skills:
•  Advanced certifications such as CPA, CFA or CFP.
•  Experience with personal finance apps and tools.
•  Ability to explain complex financial concepts in a simple manner.
•  Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think critically.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$50.00
Posted On: May 29, 2024 08:25 UTC
Category: Financial Analysis & Modeling
Skills:Forecasting, Mathematics, Financial Modeling, Business Plan, Financial Planning, Financial Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Financial Analysis
Skills: Forecasting, Mathematics, Financial Modeling, Business Plan, Financial Planning, Financial Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Financial Analysis
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Data Scientist :: with SaaS & PostHog experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are a remote SaaS company with a mission to provide online anonymity to people worldwide.

We’re looking for a professional to help us:

1. Enhance Decision-Making: This includes identifying trends, predicting future outcomes, and providing evidence-based recommendations that improve business performance.

2. Increase Efficiency and Cost Savings: By analyzing and optimizing processes, you can identify areas where resources can be used more effectively, leading to cost reductions and increased operational efficiency.

3. Advance Reporting Capabilities: Implement advanced reporting tools and dashboards that provide real-time insights into key performance indicators (KPIs), operational metrics, and strategic goals.

4. Data Quality and Integrity: Establish and enforce rigorous data governance and quality control measures to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of the data used for analysis and reporting.

5. Custom Analytics Solutions: Develop custom analytics solutions and models that address specific business questions or challenges.


To be the best fit for this project you need:

- Proficiency in GA4 and substantial experience in Google Analytics with 3+ years of experience.
- Experience in SaaS and PostHog app.
- Efficiency. Able to produce significant output with minimal wasted effort.
- Analytical skills. Able to structure and process qualitative or quantitative data and draw insightful conclusions from it.
- Attention to detail.  No data is irrelevant.
- Proactivity. Acts without being told what to do.
- Flexibility/adaptability. Adjusts quickly to changing priorities and conditions and can adjust the data lake to the needs of the organization.
- Statistical Analysis and Mathematical Skills
- Programming and Data Manipulation: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R. Skills in SQL for data retrieval, pandas for data manipulation in Python, or dplyr in R are also important.
- Data Visualization and Reporting: Competence in data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or even Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn is vital.


To apply:

Please begin your application with the word 'PostHog' to demonstrate your attention to detail.

We eagerly await your application!


Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: May 29, 2024 08:06 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Marketing Analytics, Operations Analytics, Product Analytics, Google Analytics, Data Science
Skills: Marketing Analytics, Operations Analytics, Product Analytics, Google Analytics, Data Science
Country: Seychelles
click to apply

item.title: ETL developers with Pentaho  - Upwork
item.description:
ETL DEVELOPER

Experience level: 5- 7 Years with Pentaho
Location : Pune - hybrid

Role overview:
• Focused on providing customer value by following delivery best practices to deliver and
supporting quality artefacts
• Implement data flows to connect operational systems, data for analytics and business
intelligence (BI) systems
• Document source-to-target mappings
• Re-engineer manual data flows to enable scaling and repeatable use
• Be responsible for the build of data-streaming systems
• Write ETL scripts and code to make sure the ETL process performs optimally
• Develop business intelligence reports that can be re-used
• Build accessible data for analysis
• Positive impact on wider team engineering practices
• Supports peers and juniors
Key Responsibilities:
• Communication skills (data). You can listen to the needs of technical and business
stakeholders and interpret them. You know how to manage stakeholder expectations. You are
flexible and capable of proactive and reactive communication. You know how to facilitate difficult
discussions within the team or with diverse senior stakeholders
• Data analysis and synthesis. You understand and can help teams apply a range of techniques
for data profiling. You can source system analysis from a complex single source. You can bring
multiple data sources together in a conformed model for analysis.
• Data development process. You can design, build and test data products that are complex or
large-scale. You know how to build teams to complete data integration services
• Data innovation. You can identify areas of innovation in data tools and techniques, and
recognise appropriate timing for adoption.
• Data integration design. You know how to select and implement the appropriate
technologies to deliver resilient, scalable and future-proofed data solutions.
• Data modelling. You understand the concepts and principles of data modelling and can
produce relevant data models. You know how to work across the business, recognising opportunities
for re-use and alignment between the data models in different teams. You can design the method to
categorise data model within the organisation.
• Metadata management. You can design an appropriate metadata repository and present
changes to existing metadata repositories. You understand a range of tools for storing and working
with metadata. You can provide oversight and advice to more inexperienced members of the team.
• Problem resolution (data). You can ensure that the most appropriate actions are taken to
resolve problems as they occur. You know how to coordinates teams to resolve problems and
implement solutions and preventative measures.
• Programming and build (data engineering). You know how to use agreed standards and tools
to design, code, test, correct and document moderate-to-complex programs and scripts from agreed
specifications and subsequent iterations. You can collaborate with others to review specifications
where appropriate.
• Technical understanding (data engineering). You have the detailed knowledge and
understanding of the technical concepts required for the role. You know how these fit into the wider
technical landscape.
• Testing. You can review requirements, specifications and define test conditions. You can
identify issues and risks associated with work while being able to analyse and report test activities
and results.
Client tech stack:
• Azure DevOps
• Terraform
• Azure Data Factory
• Azure Databricks
• Scala
• Python
• NET Core
• MS Power BI Embedded
Skillsets required for Data Engineers: -
• SQL performance
• SQL query tuning
• SQL monitoring
• SQL Data warehousing
• SQL Indexing
• Star Schema Design


Budget: $10,000
Posted On: May 29, 2024 06:22 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:ETL, Pentaho
Skills: ETL, Pentaho
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: AI Application Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a talented and dedicated team or freelancer to join our project on Upwork! We are searching for individuals who are passionate about AI and can assist us in creating simple, yet effective AI products that we can incorporate with our clients.

The ideal candidate should have expertise in areas such as creating a co-pilot, data analysis from internal sources, and other AI-related tasks. We require individuals who can work with us on an ongoing basis, possess excellent communication skills, and can work at a fast pace while maintaining the highest levels of quality.

In addition, we value trustworthiness and reliability above all else. Candidates should have a good understanding of AI technology, as well as experience working with Azure AI and Azure Cloud. If you have a background in prompt writing and creating SAAS/web-based applications, even better!

For our first project we want to create an interface that seamlessly integrates with cloud storage for easy access to internal data and documents, or connect to internal database. Additionally, the interface will also support connection to external websites via URLs. Users will have the ability to upload their own files and utilize our AI tool to analyze and retrieve information from the data. As a web-based application, this interface will offer seamless integration with various clients for maximum usability and accessibility.

The integration of cloud storage and external website connection will allow users to easily access and manage their data and documents without having to switch between multiple platforms. This will save time and effort, leading to increased productivity for clients.

Furthermore, the AI tool will assist in analyzing and retrieving information from the uploaded data, eliminating the need for manual data analysis. This will also contribute to increased productivity by streamlining the data retrieval process.

Moreover, the seamless integration with various clients will provide a consistent user experience and reduce the learning curve for new users. This will enable clients to quickly and efficiently navigate the interface and perform tasks, resulting in increased productivity.

In summary, our interface will optimize the data management process, saving time and effort for clients, and allowing them to focus on other important tasks, leading to increased productivity for their businesses.

If you are a dedicated and skilled AI expert looking for a new and exciting opportunity, we want to hear from you. Submit your application today and let's create amazing AI products together!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$45.00
Posted On: May 29, 2024 06:10 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Artificial Intelligence, Python, JavaScript, Natural Language Processing, Azure AI Vision, Microsoft Power BI, AI Agent Development, AI App Development, AI Builder
Skills: Artificial Intelligence, Python, JavaScript, Natural Language Processing, Azure AI Vision, Microsoft Power BI, AI Agent Development, AI App Development, AI Builder
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Specialist to Create Data Visualization, Reporting, and Analysis - Needed to Start ASAP - Upwork
item.description:
High Level Overview
We are seeking a skilled Power BI specialist to assist us in analyzing a comprehensive dataset, creating insightful visualizations, and generating detailed reports. The successful candidate will work with our large dataset to provide meaningful business insights, answer key questions, and produce professional reports through data visualization and analysis.

NOTE ON TIMING: We need this person to start tomorrow! We need to deliver this dashboard to the client by Thursday afternoon Eastern Time in the United States. I would ideally like to connect with the person I hire tomorrow morning my time to discuss further, which is Wednesday morning (May 29) Eastern Daylight Time (8-12 hours from the time this post is published).

Responsibilities
- Develop interactive Power BI dashboards and reports based on the dataset.
- Create visualizations to answer specific business questions.
- Generate detailed reports that provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
- Collaborate with our team to refine and enhance data visualization and reporting needs.

Example Questions to Answer
- Commercial Flight Costs by City: Create a map visualization of commercial flight costs by home city.
- Costs by Carrier: Visualize and report costs by carrier, showing the relationship between the transport carrier name and flight cost.
- Cost per Seat vs. Passenger Cost: Analyze, visualize, and report the per-seat cost versus the per-passenger cost.
- Reservation Creation Analysis: Visualize and report the number of reservations created by roster versus human names, broken down by month.

Additional Analysis Questions
- Booking Trends: Analyze, visualize, and report booking trends over time, identifying peak periods and patterns.
- Guest Demographics: Visualize and report data on guest demographics, such as home city and province.
- Resource Type Distribution: Examine, visualize, and report the distribution of different resource types booked, such as charter flights.

Required Skills
- High level of proficiency in Microsoft Power BI.
- Experience with large datasets and data modeling.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication skills to explain data insights and report findings.

Bonus Qualifications
- Previous experience in the travel or transportation industry.
- Familiarity with flight cost analysis and reservation systems.

Dataset Description
The dataset contains detailed information on flight bookings, including but not limited to:

- Reservation Details: Reservation creation type, booking date, and reservation number.
- Flight Information: Transport carrier name, flight cost, and tail number.
- Passenger Information: Guest name, home city, and home province.
- Cost Analysis: Commercial cost, per-seat cost, and per-passenger cost.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: May 29, 2024 03:01 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Operations Analytics, Dashboard, Exploratory Data Analysis, Report, Business Intelligence, Cluster Analysis, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis
Skills: Operations Analytics, Dashboard, Exploratory Data Analysis, Report, Business Intelligence, Cluster Analysis, Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis
Country: United States

item.title: Microsoft Fabric Dashboard Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Microsoft Fabric Dashboard Developer to create a customized dashboard that will seamlessly connect with our Azure SQL database. The primary objective of this role is to design and develop a user-friendly dashboard interface that not only retrieves data from the database but also presents it in a visually appealing and easily understandable format. Additionally, the dashboard should have the capability to export its contents as images for further utilization.

Responsibilities:

- Develop a Microsoft Fabric dashboard that effectively interfaces with Azure SQL database.
- Customize the dashboard to align with our branding guidelines and requirements.
- Ensure accurate and efficient retrieval and display of data within the dashboard.
- Implement functionality to enable the generation of dashboard images for external use.

Required Skills:

- Proficiency in Microsoft Fabric UI.
- Extensive experience and expertise in working with Azure SQL databases.
- In-depth knowledge of dashboard design principles.
- Ability to customize and tailor the dashboard to meet specific branding requirements.
- Familiarity with various data visualization techniques.

This is a medium-sized project anticipated to be completed within a timeframe of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level developer who possesses prior experience in building similar dashboards and working with Azure SQL databases.


Tasks:
Set up Data Sources:

Configure your Azure SQL Database or Cosmos DB instance to ensure it contains the data needed for your dashboards.
Ensure that the data model is optimized for reporting and analysis purposes in Power BI.
https://app.fabric.microsoft.com/home?experience=data-warehouse
Connect Power BI to Data Sources:

Use Power BI Desktop or Power BI service to connect to your Azure SQL Database or Cosmos DB.
Import the necessary datasets or configure direct queries to your database.
Create Power BI Reports:

Use Power BI’s drag-and-drop functionality to create visualizations and reports based on your data.
Design interactive dashboards that allow users to filter and drill down into specific data points.
https://app.powerbi.com/home?tenant=ae74c845-125c-4c11-99a0-af5d9bc35e7e&experience=power-bi
Publish and Share Dashboards:

Once your reports are ready, publish them to the Power BI service.
Configure access permissions to ensure that customers see only their data.
You can embed the dashboards into your application using Power BI Embedded or share them directly with users via the Power BI service.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/javascript/api/overview/powerbi/powerbi-client-react
White-labeling:

Power BI Embedded allows you to white-label the dashboards and maintain branding consistency within your application.
You can customize the look and feel of the Power BI interface to match your application’s design.
https://wyn.mescius.com/blogs/how-to-embed-a-bi-dashboard-in-a-react-application
Automation and Refresh:

Set up automatic data refresh schedules so that your dashboards always display up-to-date information.
Use Power BI APIs to automate the creation and distribution of reports and dashboards for new customers.
include manual refresh button and fetch each time page loads (along with local cache for speed)
Integration into Emails:

If you want to include visualizations in emails, you can export reports as images or PDFs using Power BI’s export options.
Alternatively, you can provide links to the live dashboards within the email, so users can interact with the latest data in real-time.
https://powerbi.microsoft.com/it-ch/blog/announcing-copy-a-visual-as-an-image/
https://damobird365.com/export-power-bi-report-or-visual-to-file/
Testing:

Test the embedded dashboards to ensure they work seamlessly within your application and that they are responsive across devices.
Verify that data security and privacy are maintained and that customers can only access their data.


Budget: $200
Posted On: May 28, 2024 15:31 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:React, Full-Stack Development, RESTful API, SaaS, Agile Software Development, JavaScript, API, Web Development, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, Microsoft Power BI, Databricks Platform, Graph Database
Skills: React, Full-Stack Development, RESTful API, SaaS, Agile Software Development, JavaScript, API, Web Development, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, Microsoft Power BI, Databricks Platform, Graph Database
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
Company Overview:
NetCom Learning is a premier provider of IT and business skills training, serving individuals and organizations worldwide. We offer a comprehensive range of training solutions tailored to meet the evolving needs of professionals and businesses in today's rapidly changing technology landscape.

About the Role:
We are seeking an experienced Power BI Developer with a proven track record of delivering high-quality business intelligence solutions. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 to 4 years of hands-on experience in Power BI, coupled with a solid understanding of data and business processes. The role requires expertise in writing joins, pulling data from diverse sources, and a deep understanding of concepts like facts, dimensions, and data modeling.

Key Responsibilities:
Power BI Development: Design, develop, and maintain Power BI reports and dashboards that meet business requirements.

Data Extraction and Transformation: Utilize your expertise in writing joins and extracting data from various sources to ensure accurate and comprehensive datasets.

Data Modeling: Develop and implement effective data models, incorporating best practices for optimization and performance.

Business Acumen: Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data requirements and translate them into actionable insights.

Performance Optimization: Identify and implement performance optimization techniques to enhance the efficiency of Power BI reports and dashboards.

Documentation: Maintain documentation for Power BI solutions, ensuring that it is up-to-date and comprehensive for ease of understanding and future development.

Training and Support: Provide training and support to end-users, helping them effectively utilize Power BI for decision-making.

Qualifications:
·      Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
·      Proven experience of 3-4 years in Power BI development.
·      Strong SQL skills with the ability to write complex queries and joins.
·      In-depth understanding of data modeling, facts, dimensions, and related concepts.
·      Excellent communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
·      Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
·      Experience with other BI tools or data visualization platforms is a plus.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$12.00
Posted On: May 28, 2024 15:15 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Dashboard, API Integration, Data Visualization Framework, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Business Intelligence
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Dashboard, API Integration, Data Visualization Framework, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Business Intelligence
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Specialist for Retail Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI Specialist to implement a Business Intelligence (BI) solution for our retail company. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Power BI and experience working with retail data. As the Power BI Specialist, you will be responsible for designing and developing interactive reports, dashboards, and data visualizations to provide insights into our retail operations. This includes analyzing sales data, identifying trends, and presenting key findings to stakeholders.
    

Responsibilities:
    - Develop and implement Power BI solutions for retail data analysis
    - Design and create interactive reports, dashboards, and visualizations
    - Perform data analysis and identify trends in sales data
    - Present findings to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner
    

Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a Power BI Specialist or similar role
    - Strong knowledge of Power BI and data visualization best practices
    - Experience working with retail data and understanding of retail metrics
    - Ability to analyze complex data sets and present findings effectively
    - Excellent communication and presentation skills

item.content:encoded:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI Specialist to implement a Business Intelligence (BI) solution for our retail company. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Power BI and experience working with retail data. As the Power BI Specialist, you will be responsible for designing and developing interactive reports, dashboards, and data visualizations to provide insights into our retail operations. This includes analyzing sales data, identifying trends, and presenting key findings to stakeholders.
    

Responsibilities:
    - Develop and implement Power BI solutions for retail data analysis
    - Design and create interactive reports, dashboards, and visualizations
    - Perform data analysis and identify trends in sales data
    - Present findings to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner
    

Requirements:

    - Strong knowledge of Power BI and data visualization best practices
    - Experience working with retail data and understanding of retail metrics
    - Ability to analyze complex data sets and present findings effectively
    - Excellent communication and presentation skills
    

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Power BI Specialist who can hit the ground running and deliver actionable insights to drive our retail business forward.

item.title: Power App / PowerBI Developer Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a someone who can help us with an existing Canvas Power App that is used to track jobs and times in our production facility. Our existing version of the app has been deployed and is in use, but it was designed as a MVP and now we are looking for someone to help us make it scalable and work with us to add features as needed.

Some immediate requests include:
- Re-factor existing app to use API instead of PostgreSQL database.

- Move output data into more scalable storage solution, currently using Excel.

- Make changes to data structure where applicable to allow for desired PowerBI views. Wire frames will be provided.

- Build out various PowerBI views based on data output of the Power App.

- Consultation on plan for legacy barcode scanner control (old, works) vs. barcode reader (new, does not work) issue. Upcoming Features -  Retired - Legacy barcode scanner.

item.title: Power BI Expert working with Microsoft Planner data - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI expert who has experience working with Microsoft Planner data in Power BI. We are trying to use the FetchTasks function to fetch tasks from specific planners using the Microsoft Graph API and then transform the resulting data to extract and rename certain columns. We are receiving this error: This dataset includes a dynamic data source. Since dynamic data sources aren't refreshed in the Power BI service, this dataset won't be refreshed. Learn more: https://aka.ms/dynamic-data-sources.

item.title: Looker Studio Reports Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented professional to assist us in creating Looker studio reports to showcase ad performance online. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Looker and experience in creating visually appealing and insightful reports. This is a remote position that requires excellent communication and collaboration skills. As a Looker Studio Reports Creator, you will be responsible for developing reports that provide valuable insights into ad performance metrics. Your role will involve -

- Creating an initial build to spec from datasets we provide to show advertising KPIs of 15 products with a page dedicated to each product
- Creating brand overview pages that demonstrates the overall performance of the brand through advertising (6 brands)
- Possible future maintenance i.e. when a new product is added

A detailed brief will be provided regarding the KPIs required for display and our preferred graphs for displaying these.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: May 28, 2024 12:14 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Data Visualization, Looker Studio, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence
